str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To be hungry, needy, desire earnestly. From the same as penes; to famish; figuratively, to crave.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To thirst for, desire earnestly. From a variation of dipsos; to thirst for.

word: you gave Me nothing to drink,
parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To cause to drink, give to drink; irrigate, water. From a derivative of the alternate of pino; to furnish drink, irrigate.
